alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Lake County; Klamath Basin; Northern and Eastern Klamath County and Western Lake County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 06 at 3:45PM PST until December 06 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...In California, northeast Siskiyou and northwest Modoc counties. In Oregon, the Klamath Basin, northern and eastern Klamath County, and southeast and central Lake County. This includes portions of highways 31, 395, 139, 140 and 229. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Lake County; Klamath Basin; Northern and Eastern Klamath County and Western Lake County
